basics.name: Uendert Andrade
basics.label: Postdoctoral Researcher @ the University of Michigan
basics.summary: A dedicated researcher specializing in theoretical cosmology, computational cosmology, foundations of cosmology, cosmological principle, dark energy, dark matter, cosmological perturbations, extensions of standard cosmology, cosmography, bayesian analysis, MCMC samplers.

work.summary: Conducting research on Dark Energy with Large-Scale Structure data from DESI and DES at the University of Michigan. PI: Prof. Dragan Huterer

projects.name: The Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument (DESI) Survey
projects.summary: Involved in analyzing data from the Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument (DESI) survey to study dark energy and its effects on cosmic expansion and structure formation.
highlights: Lead anlysis efforts for the Galaxy and Quasar Catalog-Level Blinding
Contributed to the DESI collaboration's key publications

projects.name: The Dark Energy Survey (DES)
projects.summary: Analyzed data from the Dark Energy Survey (DES) to study dark energy and its effects on cosmic expansion and structure formation.
highlights: Extension beyond the standard cosmological model
